languages.text: "Ксеносы, именуемые {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарами{/g}, обрели такое влияние на ваших легковерных подданных, что я поневоле задаюсь вопросом — кто сейчас в действительности правит Янусом? Я вынужден уведомить вас, что первое же свидетельство о дальнейшем расширении власти ксеносов в ваших владениях станет приговором для данной колонии".

"These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."
languages.original_text: "Ксеносы, именуемые {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарами{/g}, обрели такое влияние на ваших легковерных подданных, что я поневоле задаюсь вопросом — кто сейчас в действительности правит Янусом? Я вынужден уведомить вас, что первое же свидетельство о дальнейшем расширении власти ксеносов в ваших владениях станет приговором для данной колонии".

traits.locale_text: "These xenos known as Aeldari have garnered such an influence on your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who really rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos authority continues to expand in your domain, it will mean the death sentence for your colony."

"These xenos known as Aeldari have garnered such an influence on your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who really rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos authority continues to expand in your domain, it will mean the death sentence for your colony."

"These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

"These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

"These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}として知られるこの異種族は、お前の世間知らずな臣下に非常に大きな影響力を持っていた。だが、不思議に思わずにはいられない。今のヤヌスを真に統治しているのは誰か、と。いいか、万一、異種族の影響力がお前の領地で広がり続けている証拠が明るみに出れば、お前のコロニーには死刑判決が下されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}として知られるこの異種族は、お前の世間知らずな臣下に非常に大きな影響力を持っていた。だが、不思議に思わずにはいられない。今のヤヌスを真に統治しているのは誰か、と。いいか、万一、異種族の影響力がお前の領地で広がり続けている証拠が明るみに出れば、お前のコロニーには死刑判決が下されるだろう」

languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the Aeldari have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

languages.text: “那些被称为{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的异形，如今已经对你那些天真无邪的臣民产生了巨大的影响。我不禁要问：现如今，究竟谁才是加努斯的统治者？我要警告你，如果我们发现任何证据，证明异形会在你的领土上继续肆无忌惮地扩张，那你的殖民地恐怕就要被判死刑了。”
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: “那些被称为{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的异形，如今已经对你那些天真无邪的臣民产生了巨大的影响。我不禁要问：现如今，究竟谁才是加努斯的统治者？我要警告你，如果我们发现任何证据，证明异形会在你的领土上继续肆无忌惮地扩张，那你的殖民地恐怕就要被判死刑了。”

languages.text: «Los xenos conocidos como los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} han obtenido suficiente influencia sobre sus ingenuos súbditos como para que necesite preguntarme quién gobierna Janus de verdad. Debo informarle de que, si recibiera pruebas de que el poder de los xenos continúa expandiéndose en sus dominios, supondrá la sentencia de muerte para toda la colonia».
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: «Los xenos conocidos como los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} han obtenido suficiente influencia sobre sus ingenuos súbditos como para que necesite preguntarme quién gobierna Janus de verdad. Debo informarle de que, si recibiera pruebas de que el poder de los xenos continúa expandiéndose en sus dominios, supondrá la sentencia de muerte para toda la colonia».

languages.text: « Ces xénos connus sous le nom d'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g} ont une telle influence sur vos sujets que je ne peux m'empêcher de me demander qui règne vraiment sur Janus. Je me dois donc de vous informer que si nous constatons que les xénos exercent un trop grand pouvoir sur votre domaine, nous serons dans l'obligation de condamner votre colonie à mort. »
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: « Ces xénos connus sous le nom d'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g} ont une telle influence sur vos sujets que je ne peux m'empêcher de me demander qui règne vraiment sur Janus. Je me dois donc de vous informer que si nous constatons que les xénos exercent un trop grand pouvoir sur votre domaine, nous serons dans l'obligation de condamner votre colonie à mort. »

languages.text: "Diese als {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bekannten Xenos haben über Eure naiven Untertanen so viel Einfluss erlangt, dass ich mich nur fragen kann, wer Janus jetzt wirklich beherrscht. Ich muss Euch informieren, dass jeder Beweis für ein weiteres Erstarken der Xenos in Eurem Reich einem Todesurteil für Eure Kolonie gleichkommt."
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: "Diese als {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bekannten Xenos haben über Eure naiven Untertanen so viel Einfluss erlangt, dass ich mich nur fragen kann, wer Janus jetzt wirklich beherrscht. Ich muss Euch informieren, dass jeder Beweis für ein weiteres Erstarken der Xenos in Eurem Reich einem Todesurteil für Eure Kolonie gleichkommt."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olarak bilinen bu zenolar, naif tebaan üzerinde büyük bir nüfuz elde etmiş. Dolayısıyla ben de merak etmeden edemiyorum: Janus'u şu an kim yönetiyor? Şunu bilmelisin ki topraklarındaki zenoların güçlerinin arttığına ve yayıldıklarına dair kanıtlar su yüzüne çıkarsa bu, kolonin için ölüm anlamına gelecektir."
languages.original_text: "These xenos known as the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} have garnered such influence over your naive subjects that I cannot help but wonder — who truly rules Janus now? I must inform you that, should any evidence surface that the xenos power continues to expand in your domain, it will mean a death sentence for your colony."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olarak bilinen bu zenolar emrindeki naif kişiler üzerinde büyük bir nüfuz elde etmişler, dolayısıyla ben de merak etmeden edemiyorum: Janus'u şu an kim yönetiyor? Bilgilendirmem gerekiyor ki yönetimindeki zenoların güçlerinin arttığına ve yayıldığına dair kanıtlar su yüzüne çıkarsa bu, kolonin için ölüm anlamına gelecektir."
